summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending the Zoning Ordinance (86300) by adding thereto new Sections 24.81, 24.82, 24.83, 24.84, 24.85, 24.86 and 24.87 to provide for special review districts, adding Section 24.91 to establish the Pioneer Square Special Review District, and adding Section 24.92 to establish the International Special Review District.
